title: Fusion of Graph Neural Networks via Optimal Transport
details: W Ormaniec, M Vollenweider, E Hoskovec - arXiv preprint arXiv:2503.21579, 2025
abstract: In this paper, we explore the idea of combining GCNs into one model. To that end, we align the weights of different models layer-wise using optimal transport (OT). We present and evaluate three types of transportation costs and show that the studied …
